mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car_info c LEFT JOIN sys_auth_dept d ON d.deptid=c.deptid WHERE d.deptname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deptname},'%');

SELECT * FROM car_info c LEFT JOIN sys_auth_dept a ON a.deptid = c.deptid LEFT JOIN device_info d ON d.carid = c.id LEFT JOIN device_last_position l ON l.carid=c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.deptid = #{deptid}
AND c.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carnumber},'%')
AND c.terminal_id=#{terminalid}
AND l.carstatus IN (1,2) and c.car_service_status = 0
AND l.carstatus IN (3,4,5,6,7,8) and c.car_service_status = 0
and c.car_service_status != 0

SELECT car.id, car.deptid, car.carnumber, car.province, car.city, car.district, car.cartype, car.remark, car.color, car.engineint, car.vin, car.installtime, car.is_delete AS isDelete, car.create_date AS createDate, car.create_user AS createUser, car.modify_date AS modifyDate, car.modify_user AS modifyUser, car.car_service_status AS carServiceStatus FROM car_info car where car.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%',#{number},'%');

SELECT count(1) FROM car_info c LEFT JOIN sys_auth_dept a ON a.deptid = c.deptid LEFT JOIN device_info d ON d.carid = c.id LEFT JOIN device_last_position l ON l.carid=c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.deptid = #{id}
AND l.carstatus IN (1,2) and c.car_service_status = 0
AND l.carstatus IN (3,4,5,6,7,8) and c.car_service_status = 0
and c.car_service_status != 0

SELECT c.carnumber , a.deptname, c.terminal_id AS terminalId, c.car_service_status, l.carstatus FROM car_info c LEFT JOIN sys_auth_dept a ON a.deptid = c.deptid LEFT JOIN device_info d ON d.carid = c.id LEFT JOIN device_last_position l ON l.carid = c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.deptid = #{deptid}
AND l.carstatus IN (1,2) and c.car_service_status = 0
AND l.carstatus IN (3,4,5,6,7,8) and c.car_service_status = 0
and c.car_service_status != 0
